TEXT.TITLE: AMERICUS TRUST FOR MERCK <MKUWI> STARTS TRADING
TEXT.BODY: The American Stock Exchange said the units of Americus Trust for Merck Shares and an equal number of prime and score components of the units, began trading today on a "when issued" basis. The trust is a unit investment trust sponsored by Americus Shareowner Service Corp and is issuing the units in exchange for shares of Merck and Co <MRK> stock tendered to the trust. The units opened on a bid and offer of 165 to 166, and the prime components, trading under ticker symbol <MKPWI>, opened on 100 primes at 119-1/2, the Exchange said. Also, the score components opened on 1,000 scores at 48, it said. Reuter
